channel.title: Spam Filter (Trial)
channel.description: Apparently the English company Clear My Mail claims that their spam filter is quaranteed to stop ALL spam messages, they even say they will refund a months' payment for the program if there's a piece of spam that it doesn't stop... You can download a trial version of the program here: http://www.clearmymail.com/

item.title: Spam Filter (Trial)
item.dc:creator: @mc-Jacob mc-Jacob
item.description:
@mc-Jacob wrote:

download: http://rapidshare.com/files/389457/blo_sands_fd.rar

password:
ganelon

heres an ebook on blocking spam for dummies ;p

heres some software ;p

Spam Prevention Solution offers a comprehensive approach to blocking spam and phishing. Trend Micro Network Reputation Services provides the initial layer of protection by stopping most of these threats at the connection layer before they even reach the gateway. The robust composite engine provides the second layer of protection by filtering spam and phishing emails at the gateway. This combined approach provides powerful cross-analysis, preventing spam and phishing emails from entering your network.

http://www.trendmicro.com/en/products/gateway/spam/evaluate/overview.htm

http://www21.fixdown.com/endown/cspw2633-2006-06-25.rar
